answers.answer: I'm not sure what could be causing the pain but if I were in your shoes I would call my doctor.

question: I'm a ftm, 23 weeks pregnant, and might be under a high risk (won't know til I see a 'specialist' as my obgyn calls it)Anyways. Last night I kept waking up every time I moved cause around my hip bones it hurt so bad. Earlier, I got up , my stomach was hurting near the right side I was like bending over to help the pain. I laid back down and my stomach hurts wayyy to bad, to the point where I started crying and yelling. My ob thinks I have preeclampsia.And I can't feel my baby right now, as they are saying since I weighed 195 prepregnancy it'll take me awhile to feel her kick and move.Help. Why is this pain hurting so bad
title: Horrible abdominal pain! hurts soo much im crying
